entry.tran: 漂流木,浮木(被海水或河流冲上岸或仍在水中漂流的木头)
entry.def: Driftwood is wood which has been carried onto the shore by the motion of the sea or a river, or which is still floating on the water.

means.word_mean: 1. wood that is floating or that has been washed ashore
